duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide safe and efficient service in both the sales and service areas of the tire and battery department.
Collaborate with team members to fulfill sales and service requests, educate other associates, and mentor new technicians.
Demonstrate knowledge of safety and compliance protocols, tire and battery industry guidelines, service standards, and equipment operations.
Utilize digital tools to plan for and drive sales, improve the service experience, and elevate associate engagement.

Communicate equipment, tools and supplies needs; track and monitor returns and special orders; operate cash registers; process transactions; maintain accurate inventory, audit, safety, and compliance standards.
Value the member's experience in the tire and battery center area and model high-quality service and products.
Complete work assignments and priorities by using policies, data, and resources; collaborating with managers, co-workers, customers, and other business partners.
